job_title: Medical Laboratory Technologist in Paramus, NJ
pros: Good experience, Good management, Free health coverage only in their medical center. which does not cover everything but is still better than nothing.
cons: Pay is less, only give 2% raise per year but the cost of insurance went up by 20%. No overtime or food benefit. health coverage is moderate at best with high premiums. there is no overtime. the union doesn't represent lab workers at all. The Tech department is not regulated at all. PTO and Sick leave require 6 months of probation before you get approval. TBH benefits and overall pay and PTO are horrible at best. 401k is the worst in any place I have ever seen. it is only a good place to work if you are 90 years old

pros:
Good for experience, and there are many opportunities to learn. Your education is reimbursed, especially for clinical employees. 
IS is a relatively small department so you can always find something new to do or assist a colleague with something.
cons:
In general, it can be taxing due to the nature(24/7, patients) of the business. Understaffed in certain departments. 
In IS: the extremely high turnover in management and operations. Projects and ongoing issues are constantly shelved due to this. Questionable management and County practices and decisions. The sidewalks were recently repaved and new lighting installed yet offices have been closed due to leaks (and possible mold) for 2+ years, new PCs but chairs and desks are falling apart, etc
